tools.name: Clinical Trials Search
tools.description: Search for clinical trials by condition, intervention, location, and other criteria
tools.notes: Implemented using ClinicalTrials.gov API v2. MCP server wrapper complete.

tools.name: Clinical Trials Get Detail
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific clinical trial by NCT ID
tools.notes: Implemented using ClinicalTrials.gov API v2. MCP server wrapper complete.

tools.name: Financial Markets Time Series
tools.description: Retrieve historical price data for financial instruments (stocks, bonds, commodities) with OHLCV data. Supports daily/weekly/monthly intervals and periods (1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 5y).
tools.notes: Implemented using Yahoo Finance via yfinance library. No API key required. Caching: 7-day TTL for historical data, 1-hour TTL for recent data.

tools.name: Hospital Prices Search Procedure
tools.description: Search for hospital procedure prices by CPT code and location
tools.notes: Implemented using Turquoise Health API. Requires API key.

tools.name: Hospital Pricing Get Rates
tools.description: Get hospital rate sheet for a specific hospital and optional CPT codes
tools.notes: Implemented using Turquoise Health API. Requires API key.

tools.name: Hospital Prices Compare
tools.description: Compare prices for a procedure across multiple facilities
tools.notes: Implemented using Turquoise Health API. Requires API key.

tools.name: Hospital Prices Estimate Cash
tools.description: Estimate cash price range for a procedure in a location
tools.notes: Implemented using Turquoise Health API. Requires API key.

tools.name: Biotech Search Companies
tools.description: Search for biotech companies by therapeutic area, stage, and location
tools.notes: Phase 1: Uses free sources (ClinicalTrials.gov). Company name matching may have limitations.

tools.name: Biotech Get Company Profile
tools.description: Get unified company profile aggregating data from ClinicalTrials.gov, SEC EDGAR, and PubMed
tools.notes: Phase 1: Aggregates data from free sources. Company name matching may have limitations.

tools.name: Biotech Get Funding Rounds
tools.description: Get funding rounds history for a company (limited with free sources)
tools.notes: Phase 1: Free sources provide limited funding data (IPO filings only). For comprehensive funding rounds, consider integrating Crunchbase API (paid).

tools.name: Biotech Get Pipeline Drugs
tools.description: Get pipeline drugs for a company from clinical trials
tools.notes: Uses ClinicalTrials.gov API to extract drug pipeline information.

tools.name: Biotech Get Investors
tools.description: Get investors/backers for a company (limited with free sources)
tools.notes: Phase 1: Free sources provide limited investor data. Full investor extraction requires parsing SEC filings. For comprehensive investor data, consider integrating Crunchbase API (paid).

tools.name: Biotech Analyze Target Exposure
tools.description: Analyze target exposure - companies working on a specific target (e.g., PD-1, HER2)
tools.notes: Uses ClinicalTrials.gov API to identify companies working on specific targets.

tools.name: S&P Global Search Companies
tools.description: Search for companies using S&P Capital IQ by name, ticker, or CIQ ID with optional filters for country and sector
tools.notes: Enterprise license required. Built by Kensho (S&P Global's AI Innovation Hub). Official partnership with Anthropic (July 2025). Provides institutional-grade financial data through S&P Capital IQ.

tools.name: S&P Global Get Fundamentals
tools.description: Get company fundamentals data from S&P Capital IQ including financial statements, ratios, and key metrics (Annual or Quarterly)
tools.notes: Enterprise license required. Provides comprehensive financial fundamentals including revenue, net income, EBITDA, assets, liabilities, cash flow, and financial ratios.

tools.name: S&P Global Get Earnings Transcripts
tools.description: Get earnings call transcripts for a company from S&P Capital IQ with optional date range filtering
tools.notes: Enterprise license required. Provides access to earnings call transcripts with full text, participants, dates, and summaries. Same system used by MS PWM.

tools.name: S&P Global Get Company Profile
tools.description: Get comprehensive company profile from S&P Capital IQ including company information, executives, ownership, filings, and corporate intelligence
tools.notes: Enterprise license required. Provides comprehensive company profile with executives, ownership structure, recent filings, and corporate intelligence. Capital IQ integration - same system MS uses.

tools.name: Real Estate Property Lookup
tools.description: Lookup comprehensive property data by address using BatchData.io API
tools.notes: Requires BatchData.io API key. Provides comprehensive property data including APN, property type, estimated value, square footage, bedrooms, bathrooms, year built.

tools.name: Real Estate Address Enrichment
tools.description: Enrich and verify a partial address using BatchData.io API
tools.notes: Requires BatchData.io API key. Verifies and standardizes addresses using USPS verification.

tools.name: Real Estate Get Tax Records
tools.description: Get property tax records for an address. Tries county assessor APIs first (free), falls back to BatchData.io
tools.external_source: County Assessor APIs (varies by county), https://api.batchdata.com
tools.notes: Prioritizes free county assessor APIs. Falls back to BatchData.io if county not supported or API key available. County-specific implementations are stubs - framework ready for production use. Supported counties: NYC, LA, SF, Miami-Dade, Dallas, Cook, Harris, Maricopa, King, Orange County CA.

tools.name: Real Estate Get Parcel Info
tools.description: Get parcel information for an address. Tries GIS APIs first (free), falls back to BatchData.io
tools.external_source: County GIS APIs (ArcGIS REST, varies by county), https://api.batchdata.com
tools.notes: Prioritizes free GIS APIs. Falls back to BatchData.io if county not supported or API key available. County-specific implementations are stubs - framework ready for production use. Supported counties: NYC, LA, SF, Miami-Dade, Dallas, Cook, Harris, Maricopa, King, Orange County CA.

tools.name: Real Estate Search Recent Sales
tools.description: Search for recent property sales in a ZIP code. Uses Redfin Data Center (free) or BatchData.io as fallback
tools.notes: Prioritizes free Redfin Data Center. Falls back to BatchData.io if available. Redfin integration is stub - framework ready for production use.

tools.name: Real Estate Get Market Trends
tools.description: Get market trends for a location. Uses Redfin Data Center (free)
tools.notes: Uses free Redfin Data Center. Redfin integration is stub - framework ready for production use. Provides median sale price, price per square foot, homes sold, days on market, inventory, months of supply, and year-over-year changes.

tools.name: Claims Parse EDI 837
tools.description: Parse EDI 837 Professional Claim file into normalized JSON format
tools.notes: Parses X12 EDI 837 professional claims. Handles PHI - ensure HIPAA compliance. Basic X12 parser implementation.

tools.name: Claims Parse EDI 835
tools.description: Parse EDI 835 Remittance Advice file into normalized JSON format
tools.notes: Parses X12 EDI 835 remittance advice. Handles PHI - ensure HIPAA compliance. Basic X12 parser implementation.

tools.name: Claims Normalize Line Item
tools.description: Normalize a claim line item to consistent format with standard fields
tools.notes: Normalizes claim line items to consistent JSON format with standard field names.

tools.name: Claims Lookup CPT Price
tools.description: Lookup CPT code price from CMS Physician Fee Schedule
tools.notes: Looks up CPT codes in CMS Physician Fee Schedule. Fee schedules must be downloaded manually from CMS website and cached locally.

tools.name: Claims Lookup HCPCS Price
tools.description: Lookup HCPCS code price from CMS fee schedules
tools.notes: Looks up HCPCS codes in CMS fee schedules. Fee schedules must be downloaded manually from CMS website and cached locally.

tools.name: PubMed Search Articles
tools.description: Search PubMed for articles using query terms, filters, and date ranges via NCBI E-utilities
tools.notes: Cloned from cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server. NCBI API key optional but recommended for higher rate limits (10 req/s vs 3 req/s).

tools.name: PubMed Fetch Contents
tools.description: Retrieve detailed article information using PMIDs or search history via NCBI E-utilities
tools.notes: Cloned from cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server. Supports multiple output formats (JSON, MEDLINE, XML, citations).

tools.name: PubMed Article Connections
tools.description: Find related articles, citations, and references for a given PMID via NCBI ELink
tools.notes: Cloned from cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server. Supports multiple citation formats (RIS, BibTeX, APA, MLA).

tools.name: PubMed Research Agent
tools.description: Generate structured research plans with literature search strategies from component details
tools.notes: Cloned from cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server. Generates standardized JSON research plan outlines.

tools.name: PubMed Generate Chart
tools.description: Create customizable PNG charts from structured publication data (bar, line, scatter, pie, etc.)
tools.notes: Cloned from cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server. Supports multiple chart types: bar, line, scatter, pie, bubble, radar, polarArea.

tools.name: FDA Search Drug Adverse Events
tools.description: Search FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) data for drug-related adverse events
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. FDA API key optional but recommended (120k req/hr vs 1k req/hr).

tools.name: FDA Search Drug Labels
tools.description: Search FDA drug product labeling information including indications, warnings, and dosage
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides comprehensive drug labeling information.

tools.name: FDA Search Drug NDC
tools.description: Query the National Drug Code (NDC) directory for drug product and package information
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides NDC directory information for drug products.

tools.name: FDA Search Drug Recalls
tools.description: Search drug recall enforcement reports including classification, status, and reason
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Supports filtering by classification (Class I, II, III) and status.

tools.name: FDA Search Drugs@FDA
tools.description: Search the Drugs@FDA database for approved drug products and applications
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides access to FDA-approved drug products database.

tools.name: FDA Search Drug Shortages
tools.description: Query current drug shortages reported to FDA including status and designation
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides current drug shortage information.

tools.name: FDA Search Device 510(k)
tools.description: Search FDA 510(k) device clearances including applicant, product code, and decision dates
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides access to 510(k) premarket notification database.

tools.name: FDA Search Device Classifications
tools.description: Search FDA device classifications including device class, medical specialty, and product codes
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides device classification information (Class I, II, III).

tools.name: FDA Search Device Adverse Events
tools.description: Search FDA device adverse events (MDR - Medical Device Reporting) including event types and dates
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Provides access to medical device adverse event reports.

tools.name: FDA Search Device Recalls
tools.description: Search FDA device recall enforcement reports including classification, status, and product codes
tools.notes: Cloned from Augmented-Nature/OpenFDA-MCP-Server. Supports filtering by classification (Class I, II, III) and status.

tools.name: NHANES List Datasets
tools.description: List available NHANES datasets for a cycle
tools.notes: NHANES data is downloaded on-demand from CDC/NCHS and cached in SQLite. New cycles released every 2 years.

tools.name: NHANES Get Data
tools.description: Query NHANES data with optional filters and variable selection
tools.notes: Supports filtering by demographics (age, gender, race), variable selection, and result limiting. Data downloaded on-demand.

tools.name: NHANES Get Variable Info
tools.description: Get information about a specific variable in a dataset including statistics and sample values
tools.notes: Provides variable statistics (min, max, mean, distinct count) and sample values. Helps understand variable distributions.

tools.name: NHANES Calculate Percentile
tools.description: Calculate percentile rank of a value for a variable with optional demographic filters
tools.notes: Calculates percentile rank for health metrics (e.g., BMI, blood pressure). Supports filtering by demographics for population-specific percentiles.

tools.name: NHANES Get Demographics Summary
tools.description: Get summary statistics for demographics data including age, gender, and race/ethnicity distributions
tools.notes: Provides overview of study population demographics. Useful for understanding sample composition and representativeness.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Search Company
tools.description: Search for companies by name or ticker symbol
tools.notes: Uses free SEC EDGAR API. No authentication required. Rate limit: 10 requests/second.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Get Company Filings
tools.description: Get company filings by name or CIK with optional filters (form type, date range)
tools.notes: Supports filtering by form type (10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, S-1, etc.) and date range. Uses free SEC EDGAR API.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Get Filing Content
tools.description: Get content of a specific filing by CIK and accession number
tools.notes: Retrieves full filing documents. Optionally extracts financial data using pattern matching. Large filings may be truncated in preview.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Search Filings
tools.description: Search filings by keyword across all companies (simplified search)
tools.notes: Simplified search that searches company names/descriptions. Full-text search requires downloading and parsing filing content.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Get Company Info
tools.description: Get comprehensive company information including submissions index
tools.notes: Provides comprehensive company data including SIC codes, exchanges, filing counts, and full submissions index.

tools.name: SEC EDGAR Extract Financials
tools.description: Extract financial data from a filing (10-K, 10-Q, etc.)
tools.notes: Extracts financial data using pattern matching. For comprehensive XBRL data, consider parsing XBRL files directly.

tools.name: Playwright Navigate to URL
tools.description: Navigate to a URL using Playwright browser automation
tools.notes: Official Microsoft Playwright MCP server. Enterprise-grade browser automation for web scraping, FDA website monitoring, and clinical trial site automation.

tools.name: Playwright Page Snapshot
tools.description: Capture accessibility snapshot of the current page (better than screenshot for LLM processing)
tools.notes: Uses Playwright's accessibility tree, not pixel-based input. LLM-friendly structured data.

tools.name: Playwright Click Element
tools.description: Perform click on a web page element
tools.notes: Supports single click, double click, and modifier keys. Uses element references from page snapshots.

tools.name: Playwright Type Text
tools.description: Type text into editable element on web page
tools.notes: Types text into form fields. Supports slow typing for triggering key handlers.

tools.name: Playwright Fill Form
tools.description: Fill multiple form fields at once
tools.notes: Efficiently fills multiple form fields in a single operation.

tools.name: Playwright Take Screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or element
tools.notes: Captures screenshots of viewport, full page, or specific elements. Supports PNG and JPEG formats.

tools.name: Playwright Evaluate JavaScript
tools.description: Evaluate JavaScript expression on page or element
tools.notes: Execute JavaScript in page context. Use with caution - can extract data or manipulate page state.

tools.name: Playwright Wait For
tools.description: Wait for text to appear or disappear, or wait for specified time
tools.notes: Essential for handling dynamic content and async page loads in automated workflows.

tools.name: Playwright Manage Tabs
tools.description: List, create, close, or select browser tabs
tools.notes: Manage multiple browser tabs for complex automation workflows.

tools.name: Playwright Save as PDF
tools.description: Save page as PDF document
tools.notes: Requires --caps=pdf flag. Useful for archiving FDA documents, clinical trial pages, and regulatory content.

tools.name: BioMCP Think
tools.description: Sequential thinking tool for structured problem-solving in biomedical research. MUST be used first for any biomedical research task.
tools.notes: Core tool for breaking down complex biomedical problems. Always use first before other BioMCP operations.

tools.name: BioMCP Unified Search
tools.description: Universal search across all biomedical domains with unified query language. Supports cross-domain searches with field syntax.
tools.notes: Supports unified query syntax like 'gene:BRAF AND disease:melanoma'. Works across articles, trials, variants, genes, drugs, diseases, NCI, and FDA domains.

tools.name: BioMCP Fetch
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information for any biomedical record (articles, trials, variants, genes, drugs, diseases, FDA records). Auto-detects domain from ID format.
tools.notes: Supports PMID, DOI, NCT ID, rsID, HGVS, gene symbols, drug names, FDA application numbers, etc. Auto-detects domain from ID format.

tools.name: BioMCP Article Searcher
tools.description: Search PubMed/PubTator3 for biomedical literature with automatic entity recognition. Includes preprints and automatic cBioPortal integration.
tools.notes: Uses PubTator3 for entity recognition (genes, diseases, drugs, variants). Automatically includes cBioPortal cancer genomics data when searching by gene.

tools.name: BioMCP Article Getter
tools.description: Fetch detailed article information from PubMed. Supports PMID, PMC ID, and DOI identifiers.
tools.notes: Supports PMID, PMC ID, and DOI formats. Can retrieve full text when available.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial Searcher
tools.description: Search ClinicalTrials.gov with comprehensive filters including condition, intervention, phase, location, demographics, and study type.
tools.notes: Supports location-based search with lat/long, demographic filters, disease synonym expansion, and both ClinicalTrials.gov and NCI sources.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial Getter
tools.description: Fetch complete trial details from ClinicalTrials.gov or NCI Clinical Trials Search API.
tools.notes: Supports both ClinicalTrials.gov (NCT ID) and NCI API sources. Returns comprehensive trial information.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial Protocol Getter
tools.description: Fetch protocol information only for a ClinicalTrials.gov trial (study design, eligibility, interventions).
tools.notes: Extracts protocol section including study design, eligibility criteria, and intervention details.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial Locations Getter
tools.description: Fetch site locations and contact information for a ClinicalTrials.gov trial.
tools.notes: Returns all trial sites with addresses, contact information, and status.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial Outcomes Getter
tools.description: Fetch outcome measures and results for a ClinicalTrials.gov trial.
tools.notes: Extracts primary and secondary outcome measures with results data when available.

tools.name: BioMCP Trial References Getter
tools.description: Fetch publication references associated with a ClinicalTrials.gov trial.
tools.notes: Returns list of publications related to the trial including citations.

tools.name: BioMCP Variant Searcher
tools.description: Search MyVariant.info database for genetic variants with comprehensive filters including clinical significance, frequency, and predictive scores.
tools.notes: Filters by gene, HGVS notation, rsID, region, clinical significance, allele frequency, CADD scores, SIFT/PolyPhen predictions. Supports OncoKB integration.

tools.name: BioMCP Variant Getter
tools.description: Fetch comprehensive variant details from MyVariant.info including TCGA, 1000 Genomes, and cBioPortal data.
tools.notes: Supports HGVS, rsID, or MyVariant ID. Includes TCGA, 1000 Genomes, cBioPortal, and other external annotations by default.

tools.name: BioMCP AlphaGenome Predictor
tools.description: Predict variant effects using Google DeepMind's AlphaGenome model with tissue-specific predictions.
tools.notes: Requires AlphaGenome API key. Provides tissue-specific variant effect predictions using UBERON ontology terms.

tools.name: BioMCP Gene Getter
tools.description: Get real-time gene information from MyGene.info including official name, aliases, summary, genomic location, and database links.
tools.notes: Accepts gene symbol or Entrez ID. Returns comprehensive gene information from MyGene.info.

tools.name: BioMCP Disease Getter
tools.description: Get disease information from MyDisease.info including definition, synonyms, MONDO/DOID IDs, and associated phenotypes.
tools.notes: Supports disease name or ontology ID. Returns synonyms enabling automatic synonym expansion in trial searches.

tools.name: BioMCP Drug Getter
tools.description: Get drug/chemical information from MyChem.info including chemical structure, mechanism, indications, trade names, and identifiers.
tools.notes: Accepts drug name or database ID. Returns comprehensive drug information from MyChem.info.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Organization Searcher
tools.description: Search NCI's organization database for cancer research centers, hospitals, and institutions.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key from api.cancer.gov. Supports filtering by name, type, city, and state.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Organization Getter
tools.description: Get organization details by ID from NCI's organization database.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key. Returns complete organization information including contact details.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Intervention Searcher
tools.description: Search NCI's intervention database for drugs, devices, procedures, and biologics used in cancer trials.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key. Supports filtering by name, type (Drug, Device, Procedure, Biologic), and synonym matching.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Intervention Getter
tools.description: Get intervention details by ID from NCI's intervention database.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key. Returns comprehensive intervention information.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Biomarker Searcher
tools.description: Search biomarkers used in NCI trial eligibility criteria including genetic variants, protein expression, and other molecular markers.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key. Helps identify trials with specific biomarker eligibility criteria.

tools.name: BioMCP NCI Disease Searcher
tools.description: Search NCI's controlled vocabulary of cancer conditions with synonym expansion.
tools.notes: Requires NCI API key. Returns NCI's standardized cancer disease vocabulary with synonyms for improved trial matching.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Adverse Event Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) for drug-related adverse events with filtering options.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional (240/min vs 40/min rate limit). Supports filtering by drug, reaction, and serious events.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Adverse Event Getter
tools.description: Get detailed adverse event report from FAERS by safety report ID.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Returns complete adverse event report with patient demographics, reactions, and outcomes.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Label Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA drug product labels (SPL) with filtering by indication, boxed warnings, and label sections.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Searches official prescribing information including indications, warnings, and dosage.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Label Getter
tools.description: Get complete drug label information from FDA with optional section filtering.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Can retrieve specific label sections like indications, warnings, adverse reactions, etc.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Device Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA device adverse event reports (MAUDE) with genomic/diagnostic device filtering.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Includes genomics_only filter for diagnostic/genomic devices. FDA uses abbreviated names (e.g., 'F1CDX' for FoundationOne CDx).

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Device Getter
tools.description: Get detailed device adverse event report from MAUDE by MDR report key.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Returns complete device event report with manufacturer, problem description, and outcomes.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Approval Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA drug approval records (Drugs@FDA) by drug name, application number, or approval year.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Searches Drugs@FDA database for NDA/BLA approvals.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Approval Getter
tools.description: Get drug approval details from FDA by application number (NDA/BLA).
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Returns comprehensive approval information including indications, approval dates, and labeling.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Recall Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA drug recall records with filtering by recall class, status, reason, and date.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Filters by recall class (1, 2, 3), status (ongoing, completed), and reason.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Recall Getter
tools.description: Get drug recall details from FDA by recall number.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Returns complete recall information including classification, affected products, and dates.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Shortage Searcher
tools.description: Search FDA drug shortage database by drug name, status, or therapeutic category.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Filters by status (current, resolved) and therapeutic category.

tools.name: BioMCP OpenFDA Shortage Getter
tools.description: Get drug shortage details from FDA by drug name.
tools.notes: OpenFDA API key optional. Returns current shortage status, reason, estimated duration, and alternative products.
